errors.error_description: Pins installation to very old version 2.6.8 instead of latest version
Incorrectly specifies Python 2.7.15 requirement when Python 2.7 is no longer supported
correction_candidates: Please ensure you have Python 3.6 or higher installed
Please ensure you have Python 3.8+ installed for best compatibility
Please ensure you have a recent Python 3.x version installed
Please ensure you have Python 3.7 or newer installed
errors.golden_answer: Please ensure you have Python 3.6 or higher installed
